titles.title: Dismissing the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the Second Congressional District of Hawaii.

action.text: The House Committee on House Administration reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-207, by Mr. Ney.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 83.

action.text: Mr. Ney asked unanimous consent to consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/15/2003--Passed House without amendment. Dismisses the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the Second Congressional District of Hawaii.
